backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with storage, authorization, and data models for users, posts, stories, messages, notifications, and announcements.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of many frontend files for build or documentation use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup including router configuration, authentication gating, startup flow, and layout routing.
frontend/src/components/announcements/An: Displays the latest announcement in a styled glassmorphic banner using fetched announcements.
frontend/src/components/posts/CommentsDr: Drawer UI for viewing and submitting comments on a post, including comment list, input form, and author profile lookup.
frontend/src/components/posts/CreatePost: Modal dialog for creating a post with text and optional image or video upload, including preview and upload progress.
Floating action button that triggers opening the create-post dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/FeedList.t: Fetches and displays the full feed of posts with loading states, error handling, and a refresh button.
Displays post media with support for images or auto-playing videos, including loading skeletons and play controls.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders an individual post with author info, media, likes, comments drawer toggle, deletion, and navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/components/posts/TrendingPo: Empty placeholder component for a trending posts section.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog for editing user profile details and profile picture with validation and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Modal form for creating a story with caption, optional image upload, preview, and progress handling.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoriesR: Displays horizontally scrollable story bubbles grouped by author and includes a create-story button and dialog.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that shows a styled fallback UI and allows resetting to home on error.
frontend/src/components/system/GlassSurf: Provides glass-effect container components with variant-based styling.
frontend/src/components/system/NavIcon.t: Renders an image icon with automatic fallback to lucide icons on load failure.
frontend/src/components/system/PageState: Shared components for loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI states.
frontend/src/components/system/PageTrans: Wraps pages with a fade‑in animation keyed by route path.
frontend/src/components/system/RoleBadge: Displays styled owner or admin role badges with icons.
frontend/src/components/system/SplashScr: Animated full‑screen splash screen showing logo and app name.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupSc: Shows startup loading phases or an error card with retry option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, interactions, and search data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based dark theme with custom OKLCH colors and premium glassmorphism and gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Implements the main app layout with navigation, user profile data, unread notifications, and periodic last-seen updates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard providing user management, post moderation, activity stats, and announcement creation.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Determines whether to show login, signup, or profile setup based on authentication and user profile state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and a signup switch.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Form for completing user profile with name, class, and year, submitting data through an actor and refreshing profile state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup screen that triggers Internet Identity login and displays errors or loading state.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page showing posts and a button to open the create-post dialog.
frontend/src/pages/messages/Conversation: Conversation view that loads messages with a user, marks them read, and allows sending new messages.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesPage: Lists all conversations with previews and navigation to individual message threads.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays user notifications, marking them as read when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Multi-step onboarding slideshow that tracks progress and completes onboarding on final step.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Displays a user's profile with avatar, role badge, bio, posts, and edit or message actions depending on ownership.
frontend/src/pages/search/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced user search interface showing matching profiles with navigation to messages or profiles.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Renders user settings including profile info, appearance theme switching, admin role management, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoriesPage.t: Lists active stories, allows creating new ones, and navigates to story viewer pages.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoryViewerPa: Displays a full-screen story viewer with timed progression, navigation controls, and author info.
frontend/src/utils/onboarding.ts: Manages localStorage flags for tracking whether onboarding has been completed.
frontend/src/utils/startup.ts: Provides timeout utilities and logging helpers for tracking and debugging app startup phases.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings and determines online status based on activity timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash; supports both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, shadows, and plugins for the app’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including known UI issues, required assets, requested fixes, and feature metadata for navigation icons, owner badge, and app logo updates.
